name: Pitrak Motif X Hagia
description:
Our piece is inspired by a traditional rug motif called "Pitrak".
Historically it is designed to protect people from the "evil eyes of people" 
When we heard about the LGBT+ stories around the globe,  “EYES” were big enemies to the community.
We dedicated this “Digital Pitrak” series to the LGBT+ communities around the world.

3 piece collection

2/3 edition.
